oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-01-02 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 2, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Don Gibson (host/performer), guest performer Billy Grammer, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1056th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Archie Campbell; Don Gibson; Billy Grammer; Jordanaires; Stringbean
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Don Gibson) (recording) -- Don Gibson introduces Billy Grammer -- It Takes You (Billy Grammer, Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner introduces Stringbean -- Train Special 500 (Stringbean) -- Grant Turner and Don Gibson announce his tour schedule -- Don't Tell Me Your Troubles (Don Gibson, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Don Gibson) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jordanaires (Musical group); Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003; Grammer, Billy
